short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension that automates Amazon's carrier central appointment pipeline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automates Amazon's carreier central appointment scheduler.

Warning: This extension is still under active development and unknown bugs may be present.
